children.value: [cite_start]Adding a multiple of one row/column to another does not change the determinant[cite: 125].
[cite_start]The determinant of a triangular matrix is the product of the principal diagonal elements[cite: 126].
[cite_start]If any row or column equals zero, the determinant is zero[cite: 127].
[cite_start]If two rows or columns are linearly dependent, the determinant is zero[cite: 128].
